short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows users to get a quick media literacy breakdown for a page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly analyze online articles for bias, misinformation, and credibility using Google's Gemini AI. Get quick, clear breakdowns of article quality, source reliability, and potential biases with a single click. Perfect for students, researchers, and anyone wanting to make more informed decisions about what they read online.

**In order to use it you must sign into a Google AI Studio and create and enter an API Key.**
